content.rendered:
Pediatric Nutrition Program

Book Free Consultation

Program Description

Our Pediatric Nutrition Program is designed to provide a healthy and balanced diet to children and teenagers based on their individual needs and preferences. Our program’s goals are to promote healthy growth and development, boost immunity, and prevent and manage chronic health conditions like obesity, diabetes, and heart disease. We collaborate closely with parents and caregivers o provide guidance and support to children and teens as they develop lifelong healthy eating habits. Our program is based on scientific research and is tailored to each child or adolescent’s specific nutritional needs.

Key Benefits of
this Program

Reduces the risk of chronic diseases: Obesity, type 2 diabetes, and cardiovascular disease can all be increased by poor nutrition during childhood and adolescence. A balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains, on the other hand, can lower the risk of these chronic diseases and promote long-term health.

Promotes healthy growth and development:
Proper nutrition ensures that children and adolescents receive the vitamins, minerals, and nutrients they require for healthy growth and development. Adequate nutrition during childhood and adolescence can lower the risk of growth and developmental problems like stunted growth, cognitive impairment, and delayed puberty.
Supports cognitive function and mental health:
Nutrition also plays a vital role in supporting cognitive function and mental health in children and teenagers. Proper nutrition can improve memory, concentration, and academic performance. Moreover, research suggests that a nutritious diet may reduce the risk of depression and anxiety in children and teenagers.

Price and package
details for program

Pakage Variation

It’s important to note that the cost of a kidney disease nutrition program may vary depending on factors such as the type and severity of kidney disease, other coexisting medical conditions, and the type and frequency of counselling and support needed.

Total Costing & Duration

Starting prices – INR 45,000

Duration – 3 Months

Read Success Stories
from Our Client

Book Free Consultation

@graph.name: Pediatric diet Nutrition Program - Echha Joshi
@graph.description: Our Pediatric Nutrition Program is designed to provide a healthy and balanced diet to children and teenagers. We help i pediatric diet and Nutrition.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
